shows.title: The Hot House Chills
shows.desc:
The Hot House is where discussion meets the dancefloor. So every evening, the space will transform itself into an indoor-outdoor space full of great ambient tunes and complete with a pop-up bar and night-time lighting and art installations, courtesy of Creative Giants. Join us as we celebrate the beauty of our festival site and dance under the stretch or stars ’til late each night.

Your Greenbelt DJ for the night will be DJ LUMA

shows.title: Silent Disco
shows.desc: It’s a family affair at the silent disco. Siblings, LUMA and ESA will DJ head to head, each on a separate channel. LUMA will be playing old skool tracks ranging from the Eighties to the Noughties, whilst ESA will be playing a more contemporary selection of dance floor anthems for the younger crowd. Which sibling will you prefer?
